metadata.description: Textual analysis of I Ching hexagram texts

recurring_phrases.title: Recurring Phrase Analysis
insights: Most common 2-char phrases: ['君子', '子以', '利貞', '有攸', '攸往']

semantic_profiles.title: Semantic Profiles
insights: Profiles include concept vectors, fortune indicators, and action indicators

trigram_symbolism.title: Trigram Symbolism Analysis
insights: Analyzed correlation between trigram assignment and symbol usage in texts
This tests the hypothesis that 說卦傳 symbolism predicts text content

commentary_prep.title: Commentary Analysis Preparation
recommended_next_steps: Import 周易正義 commentary into database
Import 周易集解 commentary into database
Import 東坡易傳 commentary into database
